Grounding Strike.name: Grounding Strike
Grounding Strike.flavor: Your strikes ensure that your foe can’t escape into the skies.
Grounding Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You can also deal +1[W], or the target cannot fly until the end of your next turn. If the target is flying when it loses the ability to fly, it falls.

Bear the Brunt.name: Bear the Brunt
Bear the Brunt.flavor: You leap upon your ally, protecting him from the searing acid that washes over your back.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: An adjacent ally is hit by a close or area attack  Effect: You are hit by the attack instead, and your ally is unaffected by the attack.
Bear the Brunt.trigger: An adjacent ally is hit by a close or area attack
Bear the Brunt.effect: You are hit by the attack instead, and your ally is unaffected by the attack.

Scale-Shattering Strike.name: Scale-Shattering Strike
Scale-Shattering Strike.flavor: With a mighty shout, you deliver a blow that sends cracks running through the dragon’s scales, as though they were little more than glass.
Scale-Shattering Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The target takes a -4 penalty to AC and gains vulnerable 5 all (save ends both).
Scale-Shattering Strike.aftereffect: If the target is a dragon, it takes a -4 penalty to AC and gains vulnerable 5 all until the end of its next turn.
